Verses: 1 boomiyengum Ore Baashaiyum, Orevidhamaana Pechchum Irundhadhu.
2 janangal Kizhakkeyirundhu Prayaanampannugaiyil, Sineyaar Dhesaththile Samaboomiyaikkandu, Ange Kudiyirundhaargal.

3 appozhudhu Avargal: Naam Sengal Aruththu, Adhai Nandraai Suduvom Vaarungal Endru Oruvarodoruvar Pesikkondaargal; Kallukku Badhilaaga Sengallum, Saandhukku Badhilaaga Nilakkeelum Avargalukku Irundhadhu.

4 pinnum Avargal: Naam Boomiyinmeedhengum Sidharippogaadhapadikku, Namakku Oru Nagaraththaiyum, Vaanaththai Alaavum Sigaramulla Oru Goburaththaiyum Katti, Namakkup Per Undaagap Pannuvom Vaarungal Endru Sollikkondaargal.
5 manupuththirar Kattugira Nagaraththaiyum Goburaththaiyum Paarkkiradharkuk Karththar Iranginaar.

6 appozhudhu Karththar: Idho, Janangal Ore Koottamaai Irukkiraargal; Avargal Anaivarukkum Ore Baashaiyum Irukkiradhu; Avargal Idhai Seyyaththodanginaargal; Ippozhudhum Thaangal Seyya Ninaiththadhu Ondrum Thadaipadamaattaadhu Endru Irukkiraargal.
7 naam Irangippoi, Oruvar Pesuvadhai Matroruvar Ariyaadhapadikku, Ange Avargal Baashaiyaith Thaarumaaraakkuvom Endraar.
8 appadiye Karththar Avargalai Avvidaththilirundhu Boomiyinmeedhengum Sidharippogappanninaar; Appozhudhu Nagaram Kattugiradhai Vittuvittaargal.

9 boomiyengum Vazhangina Baashaiyaik Karththar Avvidaththil Thaarumaaraakkinapadiyaal, Adhin Per Baabel Ennappattadhu; Karththar Avargalai Avvidaththilirundhu Boomiyinmeedhengum Sidharippogappanninaar.
10 semudaiya Vamsavaralaaru: Jalappralayam Undaagi Irandu Varushaththirkup Pinbu, Sem Nooruvayadhaanapodhu, Arpaksaaththaip Petraan.
11 sem Arpaksaaththaip Petrapin Ainnooru Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
12 arpaksaadh Muppaththaindhu Vayadhaanapodhu Saalaavaip Petraan.
13 saalaavaip Petrapin Arpaksaadh Naanootru Moondru Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
14 saalaa Muppadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Eperaip Petraan.
15 eperaip Petrapin Saalaa Naanootru Moondru Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
16 eper Muppaththunaalu Vayadhaanapodhu, Pelekaip Petraan.
17 pelekaip Petrapin Eper Naanootru Muppadhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
18 peleku Muppadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Rekoovaip Petraan.
19 rekoovaip Petrapin Peleku Irunootronbadhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
20 rekoo Muppaththirandu Vayadhaanapodhu, Serookaip Petraan.
21 serookaip Petrapin Rekoo Irunootrezhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
22 serooku Muppadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Naakoraip Petraan.
23 naakoraip Petrapin Serooku Irunooru Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
24 naakor Irupaththonbadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Theraagaip Petraan.
25 theraagaip Petrapin Naakor Nootruppaththonbadhu Varusham Uyirodirundhu, Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Petraan.
26 theraaku Ezhubadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Aabiraam, Naakor, Aaraan Enbavargalaip Petraan.
27 theraakudaiya Vamsavaralaaru: Theraaku Aabiraam, Naakor, Aaraan Enbavargalaip Petraan; Aaraan Loththaip Petraan.
28 aaraan Than Janmaboomiyaagiya Oor Engira Kaltheyar Dhesaththup Pattanaththile Than Thagappanaagiya Theraaku Marikkumunne Mariththaan.

29 aabiraamum Naakorum Thangalukkup Penkondaargal; Aabiraamudaiya Manaivikku Saaraai Endru Per; Naakorudaiya Manaivikku Milkkaal Endru Per; Ival Aaraanudaiya Kumaaraththi; Andha Aaraan Milkkaalukkum Iskaalukkum Thagappan.
30 saaraaikkup Pillaiyillai; Maladiyaayirundhaal.

31 theraaku Than Kumaaranaagiya Aabiraamaiyum, Aaraanudaiya Kumaaranum Than Peranumaayirundha Loththaiyum, Than Kumaaran Aabiraamudaiya Manaiviyaagiya Than Marumagal Saaraayaiyum Azhaiththukkondu, Avargaludane Oor Engira Kaltheyarudaiya Pattanaththaivittu, Kaanaan Dhesaththukkup Pogap Purappattaan; Avargal Aaraanmattum Vandhapodhu, Ange Irundhuvittaargal.
32 theraakudaiya Aayusunaatkal Irunootraindhu Varusham; Theraaku Aaraanile Mariththaan.
